channel.title: Mineral County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Mineral County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: NV-361 North - Calvada Summit
item.description: Calvada Summit - Elevation 6296 Feet on NV-361 North. Calvada Summit is in the Gabbs Valley Range.

item.title: NV-361 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-361 north. Distance to Gabbs and US-50 (Middlegate Junction).

item.title: US-95 North Approaching NV-361
item.description: US-95 North approaching NV-361. Use NV-361 North for Gabbs. Continue north on US-95 for Fallon.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching NV-361
item.description: US-95 North approaching NV-361 in Luning.

item.title: US-95 North - Entering Luning
item.description: Entering Luning on US-95 north - Elevation 4480 Feet

item.title: US-95 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 north. Distance to Luning, Jct. SR-361, and Fallon.

item.title: US-95 North - Mina
item.description: Entering Mina - Elevation 4540 Feet on US-95 North.

item.title: US-95 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 north. Distance to Mina, Luning, and Fallon.

item.title: US-95 North at NV-360
item.description: US-95 North at NV-360 in Mineral County.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching NV-360
item.description: US-95 North approaching NV-360 in Mineral County. Use NV-360 West for Bishop (CA). Continue north on US-95 for Fallon.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching NV-360
item.description: US-95 North approaching NV-360 in Mineral County.

item.title: US-95 North - Mineral County
item.description: Mineral County Line on US-95 North.

item.title: US-6 West - Montgomery Pass
item.description: US-6 west at Montgomery Pass - Elevation 7167 Feet.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Benton (California) and Bishop (California).

item.title: End NV-360 at US-6
item.description: End NV-360 at US-6. Use US-6 west to Bishop (California); US-6 east to Tonopah.

item.title: End NV-360 South at US-6
item.description: End NV-360 South at US-6 in Mineral County.

item.title: NV-360 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-360 north. Distance to Mina, Luning, and Hawthorne.

item.title: NV-360 South at US-6
item.description: NV-360 South at US-6. Use US-6 west for Bishop (California) and Los Angeles (California). Use US-6 east for Tonopah and Las Vegas (via US-95).

item.title: NV-360 South Approaching US-6
item.description: NV-360 South approaching US-6 in Mineral County.

item.title: Begin US-95A (US-95 Alternate) in Schurz
item.description: Begin US-95A (US-95 Alternate) in Schurz. The US-95A shield is commonplace on the stretch of highway between Schurz and Silver Springs. North of Silver Springs the US-95 with the ALT banner is used.

item.title: US-95 Alt. North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 Alt. north. Distance to Yerington, Carson City (via US-50), and Reno (via I-80).

item.title: US-95 South at US-95 Alt.
item.description: US-95 south at US-95 Alt North in Schurz. This is the southern terminus of US-95 Alt.

item.title: US-95 North - Schurz
item.description: Schurz - Elevation 4,126 on US-95 north. Schurz is home to the Walker River Paiute Tribe.

item.title: US-95 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 north. Distance to Fallon, Lovelock, and Winnemucca. This sign was upgraded to the Clearview font since the last time I photographed it in 2006.

item.title: US-95 North at Alt. US-95 North
item.description: US-95 North at Alt. US-95 North to Yerington. Continue north on US-95 for Fallon. Alt. US-95 rejoins US-95 north of Fallon at I-80.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching Alt. US-95
item.description: US-95 north Approaching Alt. US-95 to Carson City and Yerington.

item.title: US-95 North at Hawthorne Truck Route
item.description: US-95 north at Hawthorne Truck Route. Merge right for the Truck Route, merge left for US-95 north towards Fallon.

item.title: End NV-359 at US-95
item.description: End NV-359 at US-95. Turn right for US-95 south to Tonopah and Las Vegas. Continue straight for US-95 north to Fallon and Reno.

item.title: End NV-359 North at US-95
item.description: End NV-359 north at US-95 in Hawthorne.

item.title: NV-359 North Approaching US-95
item.description: NV-359 North approaching US-95 in Hawthorne.

item.title: NV-359 North - Hawthorne
item.description: Hawthorne - Elevation 4,320 Feet on NV-359 North.

item.title: NV-359 North - Anchorite Pass
item.description: Anchorite Pass - Elevation 7,626 Feet on NV-359 North.

item.title: NV-359 North
item.description: NV-359 north in Mineral County. This is the first NV-359 shield after the state line.

item.title: NV-359 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-359 north. Distance to Hawthorne. This sort of sign is common in Nevada where there is only one city listed as a destination.

item.title: Welcome To Nevada - NV-359 North
item.description: Welcome to Nevada - The Silver State, Mineral County Line on NV-359 north. Taken at the Nevada - California state line.

item.title: US-6 West at NV-360
item.description: US-6 west at NV-360 to Hawthorne. Continue west on US-6 to Bishop (California).

item.title: US-6 West Approaching NV-360
item.description: US-6 west approaching NV-360.

item.title: US-6 West - Mineral County Line
item.description: US-6 West at Mineral County Line. Taken at the Mineral - Esmeralda County Line.

item.title: Begin US-95 Alt. North
item.description: Begin Alt. US-95 north

item.title: Mineral County Line on NV-359 North
item.description: Mineral County line at California border

item.title: NV-359 North at NV/CA Stateline
item.description: NV-359 north at California border

item.title: US-95 North Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 just north of US-95A junction to Fallon, Lovelock, and Winnemucca

item.title: US-95 South at NV-359 South
item.description: US-95 south at NV-359 west to Lee Vining and Bridgeport

item.title: US-95 South/US-95 Alt.
item.description: US-95 south at Alt US-95 north to Yerrington

item.title: US-95 South/US-95 Truck Route
item.description: US-95 south at Truck US-95 South
